entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
